text:
@WhiteHouse Thought the Governors closed America to save lives? He was bitching and complaining about his jobs numbers and stock market and wanted to be open a month ago for Easter.
#Trump 
#TrumpIsAnIdiot 
#TrumpOwnsEveryDeath 
#COVID19
